channel.title: Dat percal guy
channel.description:
(NOTE:i'm making this report on behalf of agl1431,he asked me to do it since i've had more problems with percal then him)
percal has sorta ruined agls home. he destroyed part of the hill in front of agls nether portal and place random bits of cobble all throughout the mountain.I know jamie has already tried to ban him. This is my last straw,he really needs to go.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/88FVzgv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FN9LykT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vFSOohL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GYqCLbs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YHvVrdp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4WZqYjF.png[/img]
he also grifed my house a little
but it was a small amount and not worth posting pictures of

item.title: Dat percal guy
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I don’t see a new topic? Just saiyan.

Read full topic

item.title: Dat percal guy
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The forum banning doesn’t account for time, whereas the plugin does. An ingame method was implemented to solve the historic forgetfulness, and disorganization of bans. By supplying the correct parameters to the plugin it automatically manages the ban, and unbans them when the time is up. The forum banning system still works, but for the sake of management it is desired staff use the ingame command, hence the new topic in the moderator’s board.

Obviously the forum system can be used as a fall back if the plugin ever stops working for whatever reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Dat percal guy
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:8, topic:506573”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=624805.msg4254971#msg4254971 date=1362584839]

I’ve rolled him back in that area, also I’m a bit confused on the “tried to ban him” part. Anyway I’ll warn him if I see him.

hes griefed before and the ban command didnt work
[/quote]We don’t use the ban command anymore.

Wait…what?[/quote]I know tom added some sort of plugin but its not installed and I don’t know why, but the forum banning method works fine.

Read full topic
